mapper.select: SELECT WO_DT, SUM(CASE WHEN PART_MAIN_COD = '11' THEN VOLUME ELSE 0 END) CHEST, SUM(CASE WHEN PART_MAIN_COD = '12' THEN VOLUME ELSE 0 END) BACK, SUM(CASE WHEN PART_MAIN_COD = '21' THEN VOLUME ELSE 0 END) LEG FROM ICTWORKOUTRECORD WHERE USR_ID = 'sehoakasayho' AND WO_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') + CONCAT('-', #{months}::INTEGER, ' MONTHS')::INTERVAL ,'YYYYMMDD') AND #{startDate} GROUP BY WO_DT ORDER BY WO_DT

SELECT A.WO_DT, B.PART_MAIN_COD, B.PART_MAIN_NM, B.WO_COD, B.WO_NM_KOR, A.REST_TIME_SEC, A.SETS, A.REPS, A.WEIGHT, A.VOLUME FROM ( SELECT WO_DT, PART_MAIN_COD, WO_COD, REST_TIME_SEC, SETS, REPS, WEIGHT, VOLUME FROM ICTWORKOUTRECORD WHERE USR_ID = 'sehoakasayho' AND PART_MAIN_COD = '11'/*CHEST*/ ) A, ( SELECT PART_MAIN_COD, PART_MAIN_NM, PART_SUB_COD, PART_SUB_NM, WO_COD, WO_NM_KOR FROM COMWORKOUTS WHERE PART_MAIN_COD = '11'/*CHEST*/ ) B WHERE A.PART_MAIN_COD = B.PART_MAIN_COD AND A.WO_COD = B.WO_COD ORDER BY A.WO_DT

SELECT A.WO_DT, B.PART_MAIN_COD, B.PART_MAIN_NM, B.WO_COD, B.WO_NM_KOR, A.REST_TIME_SEC, A.SETS, A.REPS, A.WEIGHT, A.VOLUME FROM ( SELECT WO_DT, PART_MAIN_COD, WO_COD, REST_TIME_SEC, SETS, REPS, WEIGHT, VOLUME FROM ICTWORKOUTRECORD WHERE USR_ID = 'sehoakasayho' AND PART_MAIN_COD = '12'/*BACK*/ ) A, ( SELECT PART_MAIN_COD, PART_MAIN_NM, PART_SUB_COD, PART_SUB_NM, WO_COD, WO_NM_KOR FROM COMWORKOUTS WHERE PART_MAIN_COD = '12'/*BACK*/ ) B WHERE A.PART_MAIN_COD = B.PART_MAIN_COD AND A.WO_COD = B.WO_COD ORDER BY A.WO_DT

SELECT A.WO_DT, B.PART_MAIN_COD, B.PART_MAIN_NM, B.WO_COD, B.WO_NM_KOR, A.REST_TIME_SEC, A.SETS, A.REPS, A.WEIGHT, A.VOLUME FROM ( SELECT WO_DT, PART_MAIN_COD, WO_COD, REST_TIME_SEC, SETS, REPS, WEIGHT, VOLUME FROM ICTWORKOUTRECORD WHERE USR_ID = 'sehoakasayho' AND PART_MAIN_COD = '21'/*LEG*/ ) A, ( SELECT PART_MAIN_COD, PART_MAIN_NM, PART_SUB_COD, PART_SUB_NM, WO_COD, WO_NM_KOR FROM COMWORKOUTS WHERE PART_MAIN_COD = '21'/*LEG*/ ) B WHERE A.PART_MAIN_COD = B.PART_MAIN_COD AND A.WO_COD = B.WO_COD ORDER BY A.WO_DT
